description:
The Hideauze are mollusk-like intelligent alien entities. They are the sworn enemies of the http://anidb.net/ch79805 [Galactic Alliance of Humankind].
It is later revealed that the Hideauze are the result of human genetic modification, in an attempt to survive after their escape from http://anidb.net/t2630 [Earth] heading into an ice age. One faction of the human race merged themselves with DNA from sea creatures to evolve into the modern Hideauze. The opposing faction chose a different path, and became the Galactic Alliance of Humankind.
name: Hideauze
